definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The New York magazine is no stranger to controversial covers.
sentences.chinese: 纽约杂志对争议性封面司空见惯。

sentences.english: Over the past few decades, Sex & Sexuality have been a subject of controversy.
sentences.chinese: 近几十年，性一直都是个争议性的话题。

sentences.english: The controversial issue  into public focus.
sentences.chinese: 这中极具争议性的话题往往很受社会的关注。

sentences.english: This time the controversy is that she's been non-controversial.
sentences.chinese: 这次的争议在于麦当娜变得不具争议性。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the degree of control for "disputable events" will also be upgraded.
sentences.chinese: 另外，“争议性事件”的参考程度也将增加。

sentences.english: Wealth accumulated through various controversial websites.
sentences.chinese: 积聚的财富通过各种争议性网站。

sentences.english: The sale has calmed what threatened to be a highly controversial auction in Hong Kong next month.
sentences.chinese: 这笔令香港可能极具争议性的拍卖平息了。
在猎人中，放不放诱饵一般是个争议性话题。

sentences.english: And with it, mothering has become one of the most contentious issues around.
sentences.chinese: 此后，母性成为我们所面对的最具争议性的问题。

sentences.english: Immigration was also a big issue at both meetings.
sentences.chinese: 在两次会议上，移民都是大的争议性问题。

sentences.english: The controversial issue is often brought into public focus.
sentences.chinese: 这中极具争议性的话题往往很受社会的关注。

sentences.english: The theory of post-modernism still remains to be uncompleted and controversial.
sentences.chinese: 而后现代理论本身还存在着未完成性和争议性。

sentences.english: The more inclusive the process, the likelier that the results will not be contested.
sentences.chinese: 选举进程越具有包容性，选举结果的争议性就会越小。

sentences.english: The theory of the Five Movements and Six Climates is a controversial topic.
sentences.chinese: 五运六气学说是一种有争议性的学说。

sentences.english: The problem of translatability has been disputable in the history of translation studies.
sentences.chinese: 可译性问题从来都是翻译中一个具有争议性的问题。

sentences.english: Since then, things have grown more contentious.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，事情变得越来越富有争议性。

definition: amusing speech or act/jokes/antics/funny/amusing/Taiwan pr. [xue1 tou2]
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
